attributes.action: sponsor our Armed Forces in Afganistan by re-instating the 17.5% VAT rate now and passing proceeds over to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the credit crunch VAT cut is reversed from 15% to 17.5% now rather than in November, then several £billions would be available to support our forces in Afghanistan.

Everyone in the UK would be contributing and it would be a great way for all the people to show support for our forces in Afghanistan.
